alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 4:55PM CDT until September 06 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WALKER AND WEST CENTRAL JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gorgas Steam Plant, or 10 miles south of Dora, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hueytown, Pleasant Grove, Midfield, Brighton, Sylvan Springs, Maytown, West Jefferson, Gorgas Steam Plant, Concord, Gorgas, Birmingport and Dolomite. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
